title: Train Robbers road woes continue, but delight Father's Day home fans with rout of Dublin
description: The Bakersfield Train Robbers went 1-2 on a short three-game road trip, playing three different opponents before returning home on Sunday for Fatherâ€™s Day. The team treated those in attendance at Sam Lynn Ballpark with a 19-1 drubbing of the Dublin (Calif.) Leprechauns. Bakersfield, after a 7-6 loss at Dublin last Thursday, went to San Rafael and lost 13-1 on Friday. The team came back and got ...
